wikipedia_page.main: Caroline Hyde is a British journalist specialising in business and technology news. She currently co-anchors "Bloomberg Markets: The Close" show from New York. Prior to that she anchored Bloomberg Technology from San Francisco, and was the Berlin-based chief correspondent for Bloomberg Television, covering European business and technology since 2011 and anchoring the markets and investment show The European Open every morning.

*Caroline Hyde (European Business Correspondent and Presenter at Bloomberg)

In June 2015, Weisenthal joined the newly created markets show What'd You Miss?, which he co-anchored with Alix Steel on Bloomberg Television. The show is named after one of Weisenthal's most often-used expressions, "What'd I miss?", which he tweets almost every morning. As of July 2021, the show is co-anchored by Weisenthal, Caroline Hyde, and Romaine Bostick.
